00046 #ifndef _FC_VARMATH_P_H_
00047 #define _FC_VARMATH_P_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 // unary operations on arrays
00054 FC_ReturnCode _fc_negateInts(int num, int* data, int* resultData);
00055 FC_ReturnCode _fc_negateDoubles(int num, double* data, double* resultData);
00056 
00057 // binary operations on arrays
00058 FC_ReturnCode _fc_addInts(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, int* data1, 
00059            int numDataPoint2, int* data2, int* resultData);
00060 FC_ReturnCode _fc_subtractInts(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, int* data1, 
00061            int numDataPoint2, int* data2, int* resultData);
00062 FC_ReturnCode _fc_multiplyInts(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, int* data1, 
00063            int numDataPoint2, int* data2, int* resultData);
00064 FC_ReturnCode _fc_divideInts(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, int* data1, 
00065            int numDataPoint2, int* data2, int* resultData);
00066 FC_ReturnCode _fc_addDoubles(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, double* data1, 
00067            int numDataPoint2, double* data2, double* resultData);
00068 FC_ReturnCode _fc_subtractDoubles(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, 
00069                  double* data1, int numDataPoint2, double* data2, 
00070                  double* resultData);
00071 FC_ReturnCode _fc_multiplyDoubles(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, 
00072                  double* data1, int numDataPoint2, double* data2, 
00073                  double* resultData);
00074 FC_ReturnCode _fc_divideDoubles(int numComp, int numDataPoint1, double* data1, 
00075            int numDataPoint2, double* data2, double* resultData);
00076 
00077 // binary operator support
00078 FC_ReturnCode _fc_binaryOperatorCore(int numComp, int numData1, void* data1,
00079            FC_DataType datatype1, char* operation, int numData2,
00080            void* data2, FC_DataType datatype2, FC_Variable origVar, 
00081                  char* new_var_name, FC_Variable * new_var);
00082 
00083 // decompose vector support
00084 void _fc_decomposeVector(int inputDim, double* inputVector, int refDim,
00085                  double* referenceVector, double* normalComponent, 
00086                  double* tangentComponent);
